author: rchatter
body:
Backporting PR#28514[https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28514]  with the dependencies 28324, 28502[ @argiro  @mdonega ]

In order to validate and backport PR28040 we need to backport PR#27175 and PR#28514 to make a validation for which PPD will have to advice us on the way how to do it.  PR#27175 has been successfully backported into 10_6_X via PR28831[https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28831]

Carried out the standard tests.
title: Backporting 28514 with the dependencies 28324, 28502
